name: Land of Gods
description:
Enjoy a land of old school fantasy. Explore dungeons and battle bosses to uncover the truth behind this mysterious village you live in.

Controls:

  • Use arrow keys to move around
  • Hold shift with arrow keys to run
  • Press Enter to interact with people and objects. Also Enter to execute commands.
  • Esc to go to Pause Menu

Quick note: Ignore the games opening menu name. First World was the prototype name that I forgot to change.
